mapper.insert: insert into user ( userName, userPhoneNum, userEmail, userLoginID, userLoginPwd ) values( #{userName}, #{userPhoneNum}, #{userEmail}, #{userLoginID}, #{userLoginPwd} )
mapper.select: SELECT userName, userPhoneNum, userEmail, userLoginID, userLoginPwd, authority, enabled FROM user WHERE userLoginID = #{userLoginID}
SELECT userLoginID FROM user WHERE userLoginID = #{userLoginID}
SELECT userLoginID, userName FROM user WHERE userLoginID = #{userLoginID} and userName = #{userName}
SELECT userLoginPwd FROM user WHERE userLoginID = #{userLoginID} and userName = #{userName}
